name.en: What I Want to Show You
name.jp: What I Want to Show You

desc.en: Chise suddenly calls Sensei, saying that there's something she wants to share. After walking quite a distance with Chise, Sensei encounters a huge group of turtles.
desc.jp: Chise suddenly calls Sensei, saying that there's something she wants to share. After walking quite a distance with Chise, Sensei encounters a huge group of turtles.
desc.zh_cn: {cf知世}突然说有东西想要给老师看，便找了老师出来。和{cf知世}走了好长一段路的老师，最后看到的是为数众多的乌龟群。

hobby.jp: 俳句

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

name.en: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.jp: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)
name.zh_cn: Blue Archive Original Soundtrack (Vol.1 ~Longing for the memorable days~)

hobby.jp: 俳句

desc.en: Upon Hoshino's request for help, Sensei goes to the beach to collect seafood with her. There, Hoshino opens up about how she doesn't want the team to have any expectations for her.
desc.jp: Upon Hoshino's request for help, Sensei goes to the beach to collect seafood with her. There, Hoshino opens up about how she doesn't want the team to have any expectations for her.
desc.zh_cn: 老师在收到{cf星野}的求助请求后来到了海边，并和{cf星野}一起采集海鲜。但是在老师的帮助下，采集了太多的海鲜，{cf星野}反过来抱怨说采集海鲜似乎变成了工作。

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

name.en: I Want to Read Your Mind
name.jp: I Want to Read Your Mind

hobby.jp: 昼寝、ゴロゴロすること

desc.en: Sensei arrives at the beach to find Koharu on a rock, staring out at the horizon. After some time, Koharu and Sensei try to return to the island but panic when the tide starts to come in. Koharu clings to Sensei's back as they make their way off the beach.
desc.jp: Sensei arrives at the beach to find Koharu on a rock, staring out at the horizon. After some time, Koharu and Sensei try to return to the island but panic when the tide starts to come in. Koharu clings to Sensei's back as they make their way off the beach.
desc.zh_cn: 老师来到海边，发现凝视着海平面的{cf小春}。过了一段时间，{cf小春}和老师正想回到岛上，却发现潮水已经上涌，两人不知所措。老师将{cf小春}背在背上，离开了海边。

hobby.jp: 空想、妄想、エッチな雑誌集め
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 空想、妄想、收集淫秽杂志
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 幻想、妄想、收集色情杂志
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 空想、妄想、收集淫秽杂志

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Sensei heads to the rocky seashore at Shiroko's request. There, they go snorkeling to find a mythical clam Shiroko had read about. Does the taste live up to its reputation?
desc.jp: Sensei heads to the rocky seashore at Shiroko's request. There, they go snorkeling to find a mythical clam Shiroko had read about. Does the taste live up to its reputation?
desc.zh_cn: 收到{cf白子}的联系后，老师前往滨海岩岸。{cf白子}在那里一边为采集粮食准备浮潜，一边等待老师。随后在老师的激励之下，{cf白子}经历好几轮的捞捕，最后成功获得了梦幻的贝类。

hobby.jp: ジョギング、体力トレーニング、ロードバイク
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 慢跑、体力锻炼、公路骑行
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 慢跑、锻炼体力、骑自行车
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 慢跑、体力锻炼、公路骑行

hobby.jp: ジョギング、体力トレーニング、ロードバイク
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 慢跑、体力锻炼、公路骑行
hobby.zh_cn_tw: 慢跑、锻炼体力、骑自行车
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 慢跑、体力锻炼、公路骑行

desc.en: Sensei joins Shiroko for an unexpectedly strenuous hike and ends up exhausted. Feeling guilty for not adjusting her pace, Shiroko blames herself. Sensei consoles the disheartened Shiroko and both agree to be more mindful of each others' pace.
desc.jp: Sensei joins Shiroko for an unexpectedly strenuous hike and ends up exhausted. Feeling guilty for not adjusting her pace, Shiroko blames herself. Sensei consoles the disheartened Shiroko and both agree to be more mindful of each others' pace.
desc.zh_cn: 出门和{cf白子}一起散步的老师因为意料之外的高强度行军，体力逐渐枯竭。对于因步调调整不当造成老师的困扰，{cf白子}感到十分自责。老师拍拍垂头丧气的{cf白子}，说好接下来要互相配合步调。

desc.en: After receiving a MomoTalk message, Sensei finds Ui at the edge of the beach. Ui says she came to the beach because she felt overwhelmed by all of the attention, and Sensei tells her that other people also get away to be comfortable, just like Ui.
desc.jp: After receiving a MomoTalk message, Sensei finds Ui at the edge of the beach. Ui says she came to the beach because she felt overwhelmed by all of the attention, and Sensei tells her that other people also get away to be comfortable, just like Ui.
desc.zh_cn: 老师收到MomoTalk后，在海岸的角落里找到了{cf忧}。{cf忧}是因为周围的视线会让他感到压力，所以才跑来海边，老师告诉他，{sn其他}人跟他一样，也是为了放松而来到海边的。

hobby.jp: 読書、書籍の管理、古書の研究
hobby.zh_cn_jp: 阅读、书籍管理、古书研究
hobby.zh_cn_cn: 阅读、书籍管理、古书研究

name.en: The Small Cafe in the Forest
name.jp: The Small Cafe in the Forest

desc.en: Shiroko and Sensei go fishing on the seashore to find food. Ayane is worried about the two and follows them. After she reveals herself, Shiroko expresses her trust in Ayane.
desc.jp: Shiroko and Sensei go fishing on the seashore to find food. Ayane is worried about the two and follows them. After she reveals herself, Shiroko expresses her trust in Ayane.
desc.zh_cn: 屋子的整理告一段落后，{cf白子}和老师为了取得食物而一起去钓鱼。{cf绫音}后来也加入了他们。就在三人准备要开始钓鱼时，良舞率领的头盔团与{cf若藻}再次发动了攻击──

hobby.jp: 貯金、アルバイト

desc.en: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.jp: Just do it! Example: ystem All Green
desc.zh_cn: 干就完了，奥利给！举例/联想：System All Green

desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}渡假胜地复原{cn对策委员会}

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn:
{cn对策委员会}一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及{cf若藻}！究竟{cn对策委员会}能否顺利度过暑假呢？

name.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}渡假胜地复原{cn对策委员会}

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn:
{cn对策委员会}一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及{cf若藻}！究竟{cn对策委员会}能否顺利度过暑假呢？

desc.en: Wakamo arrives as reinforcement for Rabu but is embarrassed by Sensei's presence and runs away. Sensei predicts that with Wakamo's involvement, the future will be bumpy.
desc.jp: Wakamo arrives as reinforcement for Rabu but is embarrassed by Sensei's presence and runs away. Sensei predicts that with Wakamo's involvement, the future will be bumpy.
desc.zh_cn: 接受良舞的要求作为支持部队的{cf若藻}，因为老师也在而陷入混乱无法战斗，与头盔团一同逃走了。另一方面，{cf白子}因为钓鱼道具在战斗中受到破坏而非常失落。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.jp:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.
desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn:
{cn对策委员会}一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及{cf若藻}！究竟{cn对策委员会}能否顺利度过暑假呢？

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?

name.en: I Came to Rescue Sensei Part 1
name.jp: I Came to Rescue Sensei Part 1

desc.en: Believing Sensei was kidnapped, Wakamo is motivated. She drives out Rabu, who could be a threat to Sensei, and takes over the Helmet Gangsters. She ends up leading the Helmet Gangsters and once again challenges the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.jp: Believing Sensei was kidnapped, Wakamo is motivated. She drives out Rabu, who could be a threat to Sensei, and takes over the Helmet Gangsters. She ends up leading the Helmet Gangsters and once again challenges the Foreclosure Task Force.
desc.zh_cn: 知道老师也在这个渡假胜地的{cf若藻}，误以为老师被坏人给抓走，便和良舞与头盔团一起发起进攻。{cf绫音}虽然试图和平解决，{cf若藻}却不由分说地发动了总攻击。

desc.en: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.jp: The 7th track in Blue Archive, which is extremely popular and well-known due to the memes related to both the characters and stories.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第七首曲子，以其与人物及故事相关的梗和二创而相当热门和出名。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。

desc.en: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.jp: Most battle tracks have this characteristic. The general representation includes fast drums and featuring multiple elements in a short period of time.
desc.zh_cn: 大部分战斗曲均具备此特性，一般的表现形式为鼓点快、元素偏多的情况。

name.en: I Came to Rescue Sensei Part 2
name.jp: I Came to Rescue Sensei Part 2

name.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}渡假胜地复原{cn对策委员会}

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn:
{cn对策委员会}一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及{cf若藻}！究竟{cn对策委员会}能否顺利度过暑假呢？

name.zh_cn: {sn阿拜多斯}渡假胜地复原{cn对策委员会}

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force goes on an unexpected vacation to an uninhabited island resort. However, what awaits them is a ruined resort, an attack by the Helmet Gangsters, and Wakamo! Will the Foreclosure Task Force be able to enjoy a proper summer vacation?
desc.zh_cn:
{cn对策委员会}一行人意外地前往了无人岛的渡假胜地。
然而等待着他们的却是已经成为废墟的渡假胜地、头盔团的袭击，以及{cf若藻}！究竟{cn对策委员会}能否顺利度过暑假呢？

name.en: I Came to Rescue Sensei Part 2
name.jp: I Came to Rescue Sensei Part 2

desc.en: The Foreclosure Task Force once again manages to drive off Wakamo. Shiroko returns later and finds out the situation.
desc.jp: The Foreclosure Task Force once again manages to drive off Wakamo. Shiroko returns later and finds out the situation.
desc.zh_cn: 一行人成功击退了{cf若藻}，此时先前独自去钓鱼的{cf白子}看到了满身疮痍的大家吃了一惊。另一方面，败下阵来的{cf若藻}强迫良舞和头盔团使出杀手锏──

desc.en: After the commotion of the night subsides, each of the RABBIT Squad members start to help the villagers in their own way to break down the barriers between them.
desc.jp: After the commotion of the night subsides, each of the RABBIT Squad members start to help the villagers in their own way to break down the barriers between them.
desc.zh_cn: 在一夜的骚动过后，{cnRABBIT小队}成员们运用各自的方式帮助村民们，逐渐消除村民们的戒心。

hobby.jp: 銃器の整備、植物などの採集
打ち上げ花火
動物系の動画鑑賞

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.jp: The 104th track in Blue Archive OST, famously known for its usage in Miyu's recollection lobby.
desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST的第105首曲子，因被用于美游的会议大厅而出名。

desc.en: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.jp: Example: FEEEEVER TIME, Undefined Behavior, Goal Wo Nerae! Overall it coincides with the Uplifting genre and combat tracks.
desc.zh_cn: 举例/联想：FEEEEVER TIME、Undefined Behavior、Goal Wo Nerae!；总体上基本与Uplifting的风格和战斗曲重合。
举例/联想：Usagi Flap、第114首曲子、第159首曲子

name.en: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp
name.jp: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp
name.zh_cn: 夏日特殊作战！{cnRABBIT小队}与消失的虾子之谜

desc.en: A hot summer day in D.U. turns dark when RABBIT Squad discovers all the shrimp has mysteriously disappeared. Their investigation takes them to a small fishing village, where secrets lurk in the shadows...
desc.jp: A hot summer day in D.U. turns dark when RABBIT Squad discovers all the shrimp has mysteriously disappeared. Their investigation takes them to a small fishing village, where secrets lurk in the shadows...
desc.zh_cn: 某个炎热的夏日，和往常一样吃着便利商店便当的{cnRABBIT小队}队员发现最近虾子从便当中消失了──为了调查消失虾子的下落，一行人决定伪装成观光客潜入渔村。究竟{cnRABBIT小队}能否顺利取回虾子呢？

name.en: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp
name.jp: Special Summer Mission! RABBIT SQUAD and the Mystery of the Missing Shrimp
name.zh_cn: 夏日特殊作战！{cnRABBIT小队}与消失的虾子之谜

desc.en: A hot summer day in D.U. turns dark when RABBIT Squad discovers all the shrimp has mysteriously disappeared. Their investigation takes them to a small fishing village, where secrets lurk in the shadows...
desc.jp: A hot summer day in D.U. turns dark when RABBIT Squad discovers all the shrimp has mysteriously disappeared. Their investigation takes them to a small fishing village, where secrets lurk in the shadows...
desc.zh_cn: 某个炎热的夏日，和往常一样吃着便利商店便当的{cnRABBIT小队}队员发现最近虾子从便当中消失了──为了调查消失虾子的下落，一行人决定伪装成观光客潜入渔村。究竟{cnRABBIT小队}能否顺利取回虾子呢？

desc.en: Ui and the others decide to investigate the lighthouse next. Sensei comes out to help Hinata, who's been carrying everyone's bags by herself. As they chat, Mimesises surround the lighthouse and Hinata fights them off to prevent the others from being disturbed.
desc.jp: Ui and the others decide to investigate the lighthouse next. Sensei comes out to help Hinata, who's been carrying everyone's bags by herself. As they chat, Mimesises surround the lighthouse and Hinata fights them off to prevent the others from being disturbed.
desc.zh_cn: {cf忧}一行人决定接下来要调查灯塔。老师到外面帮忙独自搬运行李的{cf日向}。就在两人短暂闲聊之际，「拷贝」包围了灯塔，{cf日向}为了避免{sn其他}人受到妨碍，出面展开战斗。

hobby.jp: お祈り、整理整頓

name.zh_cn: 调查点C「废弃的柠檬农场」

name.en: Trinity Extracurriculars: In Search of Hidden Ruins
name.jp: Trinity Extracurriculars: In Search of Hidden Ruins
name.zh_cn: 寻找隐藏的遗产～{sn三一}的课外活动～

desc.en: Ui was caught secretly copying the Sisterhood's scriptures. Thanks to Hanako's mediation (?), she's been given a small task to make it up to the Sisterhood... An expedition to a deserted island off the coast of Trinity!
desc.jp: Ui was caught secretly copying the Sisterhood's scriptures. Thanks to Hanako's mediation (?), she's been given a small task to make it up to the Sisterhood... An expedition to a deserted island off the coast of Trinity!
desc.zh_cn: 偷偷拷贝{cn修女会}的经典却被发现的{cf忧}，在{cf花子}的仲裁下（？）担负起调查遗址的任务……在{sn三一}近海的无人岛展开横冲直撞的遗迹探险记！
